summary: Fleeting hearts
title: Fleeting hearts
body:
Masterpost

Chaptered: 1/?

Summary:

“Something isn’t right. There’s a shift in the reality, Phil can’t really put his finger on what exactly but it feels like wearing an itchy sweater, the discomfort weaved into the shirt. The feeling was faint when he woke up today, looming in his every step, just behind him.

But now its almost unbearable, skin tight and Phil has problems breathing. There’s something wrong with the world he is in. It isn’t his.”

Phil wakes up as always, but something is different… a lot of things actually. Why has he winded up in an alternative universe? How did he end up dating Chris and why does PJ look like he came out of a fashion catalogue. But most important of all, is Dan here?

Fleeting hearts

Chapter 1
Something isn’t right. There’s a shift in the reality, Phil can’t really put his finger on what exactly but it feels like wearing an itchy sweater, the discomfort weaved into the shirt. The feeling was faint when he woke up today, looming in his every step, just behind him.

But now its almost unbearable, skin tight and Phil has problems breathing. There’s something wrong with the world he is in. It isn’t his.

Usually, by this time, He and Louise will gather at the old cinema. It isn’t like her to arrive late. As he’s watching the clock hands move he’s wondering if she’s even going to show up. He scratches his wrist. That’s when he notices it, the faint writing in ink. It’s almost invisible against his pale skin, he wonders when it was written. He can’t remember writing it.

By the time someone peeks through the door and dust soar around in the light filtering in, Phil looks up from his phone. Just as he’s about to call Louise, a familiar voice stops him in his tracks.

“Phil, what are you doing here? Chris has been worrying all night.” Phil doesn’t even have to see his face to know that it’s PJ. But when the light finally finds PJ’s features, he’s surprised to see that he doesn’t recognise the young man. Of course, he has the same face but the PJ Phil knows doesn’t have bleached curls falling in front of his eyes. The only thing keeping Phil from questioning all he’s ever known is the acquaint genuine smile on PJ’s face. At least that’s the same as its always been.

“PJ?” Phil can’t help but let the name slip past his lips, it sounds more like a question, although he didn’t intend it to be. And the polo shirts are new as well. It’d be rude to say that it didn’t fit PJ, but on the other hand, Phil had a slight hunch that this PJ might be a bit different from his own.

“Yeah man, who did you think it was? Santa? Or even better Chris.” PJ winks at the last bit, Phil visibly tilts his head to the side like a confused puppy. Why would Phil want it to be Chris?

“No actually… I was-” But Phil doesn’t have time to finish his sentence before PJ cuts him off. “Come on man, we need to hurry, catch the train and all, Chris is waiting!” PJ grabs Phil by the wrist and pulls him out of the cinema’s door. “But Louise?” Phil whispers confused.

“Who’s Louise? You know what, I don’t care, just lock the god damn  door so that we can go!” Phil furrows his brow. “But I don’t have a key you see it’s Louise who owns the cine-”. PJ stops in his tracks and eyes Phil. “Phil has something happened to you, have you taken something?” Phil’s eyes flit from the closed door in front of him to PJ’s deep green eyes. “No… I don’t think so.” PJ places a hand on his shoulder and pats him, it’s almost as if he’s nervous over Phil’s behaviour.

“You bought it in your twenties man, it had been closed down for centuries.” Phil interrupts him “I’m still in my twenties” PJ rolls his eyes “yeah yeah”.

Then he continues “they were about to wreck it, in came you its saviour. I think it was around the time when you first met Chris wasn’t it, ya charmer” PJ winks and laughs then pats him absentmindedly on the back.

“I met Chris?” PJ laughs “you’ve definitely taken something, where’d you get it?” Phil’s frown grows even deeper “no…” PJ already on his way down the street “Come on, hurry, the keys are probably in your pocket or something.”

When Phil reaches his hand down into the deep pocket of his black flared out pants, sure enough, the keys lay there safely, secured from the outside world. But now more than anything Phil wonders where Dan is.

Chapter two

When Phil reaches his hand down into the deep pocket of his black flared out pants, sure enough, the keys lay there safely, secured from the outside world. But now more than anything Phil wonders where Dan is.

summary:
I just finished my DanandPhilGAMES marathon.
I watched all 261 videos in one week while somehow still managing to do schoolwork...
body:
I just finished my DanandPhilGAMES marathon.

I watched all 261 videos in one week while somehow still managing to do schoolwork and get sleep.

I’ve literally taken over 500 screenshots.

Right, time to start bingeing Dan and Phil’s entire separate channels
